entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
